summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVegane.l.f. Cosmetics Power Grip Primer + 4% Niacinamide preps and primes your face for the perfect makeup application while smoothing skin and brightening the look of dullness. The gel-based formula goes on clear, making it the ideal makeup application base for all skin tones.
details: DetailsBenefitsGel primer formula grips makeup for long-lasting wearGives skin a dewy, glowing finishTranslucent-finish primer works on all skin tonesGreat for oily, normal, dry & combination skin types100% vegan, cruelty-free & Leaping Bunny CertifiedMade in a Fair-Trade Certified facilityKey Ingredients4% Niacinamide evens out skin tone & brightens the look of dullnessFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabens,Nonylphenol ethoxylatesTriclosanTriclocarbanHydroquinoneItem 2604932How To UseApply makeup primer evenly to face before makeup using your fingertips to pat into the skin. The warmth of your fingers will help the product melt into skin for even application. Allow 30 seconds to set before applying makeup.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, PEG-150 Distearate, Polysorbate 80, Tocopherol, Hylocereus UndatusFruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, PEG-240/HDI Copolymer Bis-Decyltetradeceth-20 Ether, Potassium Laurate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Disodium EDTA, Pentylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol. May Contain: Red 40 (CI 16035), Yellow 5 (CI 19140).
how_to_use: Apply makeup primer evenly to face before makeup using your fingertips to pat into the skin. The warmth of your fingers will help the product melt into skin for even application. Allow 30 seconds to set before applying makeup.

reviews.headline: Staying Power with Skin Benefits
reviews.comments: How is ELF not the #1 brand on the planet with products like these at such excellent price points?!  This will make your make up STAY on & it only takes a tiny amount.

reviews.headline: Not a fan
reviews.comments: I have used other e.l.f. primers and liked them so I thought I would give this a try.  Not a fan, it is very sticky and feels like putting glue on your face.  I have tossed this to the side and haven't used it since I purchased it

reviews.headline: Decent, wouldn't buy again
reviews.comments: I really wanted to like this product, and for a while I had convinced myself that I did, but now nearing the end of my tube I've ultimately decided this product is just mid. I feel like the stickyness of the product is more gimmicky than helpful, and I find that a lot of my makeup (especially blush and bronzer) has a hard time laying down correctly with this product. It does however have a really nice cooling effect that I enjoy. This product has also caused me to have worse breakouts in hot weather, and I feel like its caused my pores to be a little more visible over time as a result of using. Just not for me.

reviews.headline: Most Favorite Primer so far
reviews.comments: I heard alot about how good the primer was, i really needed to see for myself, used it for first time today to go to an event and makeup stayed on whole time and didnt make me break out or get oily skin. 10/10 would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a solid primer

reviews.headline: For the price I will repurchase
reviews.comments: I wanted to try this primer because it had been recommended to me, I thought it would be the same as the blue one because it broke me out, but this one was better and it kept my makeup on through 90 degree weather for 10hrs. This primer is probably my new favorite for the price and product.

reviews.headline: Would buy again.
reviews.comments: My niece recommended this Primer. I really like the way it works. Definitely leaves your skin ready for your make up.

reviews.headline: Love it, Great price point
reviews.comments: I have used very expensive primers and this one is just as good, if not better! I love that it doesn't feel like a layer of plastic on my skin, but allows my natural skin through.

reviews.headline: The only primer I use
reviews.comments: This keeps my makeup and sunscreen from sliding around on my face when I sweat

reviews.headline: Loved and repeat
reviews.comments: My granddaughter needed this repeat purchase so we bought Obviously loved

reviews.headline: Amazing Primer
reviews.comments: I love this primer so much. It gives my makeup an amazing base and it feels hydrating while also keeping my makeup in place. Ive repurchased this about 3 times.

reviews.headline: Amazing primer
reviews.comments: I prefer this primer over the original power grip. It doesnt peel and it keeps my makeup on all day through humid weather. the only "con" is that its very sticky (given its a gripping primer lol) so just wanted to put that out there in case theres any texture sensitive baddies thining about buying. overall this is such a great primer especially for the price.

reviews.headline: Best Primer
reviews.comments: Always have on hand! Ensures my foudation and concealer stays in place and I like that it also contains Niamicide which helps with my dark spots while wearing makeup.

reviews.headline: On my second empty!!!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite primer. It's so sticky and has that nice tack I like in a primer, but it still doesn't dry out my skin. It's glowy, but is doesn't have any glitter in it. But to you all who like their face matte, this one's not for you unless you're covering your entire face with product.

reviews.headline: Yess!!
reviews.comments: My daughter loves it

reviews.headline: love ❤️
reviews.comments: love love makes my makeup stay.

reviews.headline: love this!!
reviews.comments: i love this primer it applies evenly and is very sticky leaving my makeup looking great all day long. i havent tried the blue one but i am looking forward to trying it as i have went through so many of these!!

reviews.headline: Love this primer!!
reviews.comments: I actually really love this primer its hydrating and gripping i also love how theres a little skincare in it

reviews.headline: Constant restock
reviews.comments: This product is amazing it does everything it claims. My makeup is not budging with this primer and it's also not drying at all. My only complain is that I wish the container was bigger!

reviews.headline: I think they changed the formula or something
reviews.comments: I used this a couple of years ago daily and had no problem it even felt great on my skin. Now, I bought it again after a while of not using it and it made my skin breakout horribly. I felt a burning sensation on my skin too. My mom wanted to try it and since I didn't wanted to use it, I gave it to her, but I warned her about it, and she also had a breakout on her skin although she never gets reactions on products.

reviews.headline: Patchy and impossible to blend makeup
reviews.comments: Used this once to see what all the hype wss about and my makeup came out patchy and it was impossible to blend my concealer and foundation.

media.headline: I would buy this over and over !

faceoff_positive.comments: For the longest time, I could not understand the hype with this product. I had a hard time getting it to work and was experiencing my makeup sliding around and breaking up around my nose and creasing. I recently learned I was applying way too much skincare for this primer to be effective. Now, all I do is a hydrating toner, SPF, and then I go in with this primer before I start my makeup and it works like a dream. It keeps my makeup intact all day long, and my makeup looks good even after sweaty gym sessions. My advice if you feel like this product is working against you is to use minimal skincare beforehand, but making sure whatever skincare you do use is still hydrating. I genuinely love this primer now and it will definitely be a staple from here on out.
faceoff_positive.headline: Had A Learning Curve, Now I Love It!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I have combo skin. After applying the e.l.f. Cosmetics Power Grip Primer + 4% Niacinamide and waiting a minute, I applied my foundation, Estée Lauder Futurist Hydra Rescue Moisturizing Foundation SPF 45. I usually have make up break up around my nose so I had high hopes for this primer. I noticed how tacky the primer was so I knew I had to work quickly with my foundation. UGH! It gave me the worst coverage and accentuated every pore. It made my skin look horrible! "I couldn't wait to take off my make up," bad. It also made my foundation look splotchy because it gripped in a bad way. I looked at my nose hoping at least that should be good. Unfortunately, the foundation still broke up on my nose. Not happy with this primer at all. 

Maybe I'll just add more hydration to my face prior to the primer? Well it tried that the  following day, hoping to still make it workable. Alas, it's the primer...not me and my application.
faceoff_negative.headline: I would NOT purchase again.
